Verses: 1 saatchiyaagiya Oruvan, Idappatta Aanaiyaik Kettirundhum, Thaan Kandadhaiyum Arindhadhaiyum Theriviyaadhirundhu Paavancheydhaal, Avan Than Akkiramaththai Sumappaan.

2 asuththamaana Kaattumirugaththin Udalaiyaavadhu, Asuththamaana Naattumirugaththin Udalaiyaavadhu, Asuththamaana Oorumpraanigalin Udalaiyaavadhu, Ivvidha Asuththamaana Yaadhoru Vasthuvaiyaavadhu, Oruvan Ariyaamal Thottaal, Avan Theettum Kutramum Ullavanaavaan.
3 alladhu, Endha Asuththaththinaalaagilum Theettuppatta Oru Manidhanai Oruvan Ariyaamal Thottu, Pinbu Adhai Arindhukondaal, Avan Kutramullavanaavaan.

4 manidhar Padhari Aanaiyidum Endhakkaariyaththinaalaagilum Theettuppatta Oruvan Theemai Seygiradharkaavadhu Nanmai Seygiradharkaavadhu, Than Manam Ariyaamal, Than Udhadugalinaal Padhari Aanaiyittu, Pinbu Avan Adhai Arindhukondaal, Adhaikkuriththuk Kutramullavanaavaan.
5 ippadippattavaigal Ondril, Oruvan Kutramullavanaagumpodhu, Avan Thaan Seydhadhu Paavam Endru Arikkaiyittu,

6 thaan Seydha Paavaththukkup Paavanivaarana Paliyaaga, Aadugalilaavadhu Vellaadugalilaavadhu, Oru Penkuttiyaik Kutranivaarana Paliyaagak Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvaravendum; Adhinaale Aasaariyan Avan Seydha Paavaththaikkuriththu Avanukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan.

7 aattukkuttiyaik Konduvara Avanukku Sakthiyillaadhirundhaal, Avan Seydha Kutraththinimiththam Irandu Kaattuppuraakkalaiyaavadhu, Irandu Puraakkunjugalaiyaavadhu, Ondraip Paavanivaarana Paliyaagavum Matrondrai Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaagavum, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvarakkadavan.
8 avaigalai Aasaariyanidaththil Konduvaruvaanaaga; Avan Paavanivaarana Palikkaanadhai Munne Seluththi, Adhin Thalaiyai Adhin Kazhuththinidaththil Killi, Adhai Irandaakkaamal Vaiththu,
9 adhin Raththaththil Konjam Eduththu, Palipeedaththin Pakkaththil Theliththu, Meedhiyaana Raththaththaip Palipeedaththin Adiyile Vadiyaviduvaanaaga; Idhu Paavanivaaranapali.
10 matradhai Niyamaththinpadiye Avan Thaganapaliyaai Seluththakkadavan; Ivvidhamaaga Avan Seydha Paavaththai Aasaariyan Nivirththi Seyyakkadavan; Appozhudhu Adhu Avanukku Mannikkappadum.

11 irandu Kaattuppuraakkalaiyaavadhu Irandu Puraakkunjugalaiyaavadhu Konduvara Avanukku Sakthiyillaadhirundhaal, Paavam Seydhavan Paavanivaaranaththukkaaga Oru Eppaa Alavaana Melliya Maavile Paththil Oru Pangaith Than Kaanikkaiyaagak Konduvaruvaanaaga; Adhu Paavanivaarana Paliyaayiruppadhinaal, Adhinmel Enney Vaarkkaamalum Thoobavarkkam Podaamalumirundhu,

12 adhai Aasaariyanidaththil Konduvaravendum; Adhile Aasaariyan Gnaabagakkuriyaana Pangaagath Than Kaippidi Niraiya Eduththu, Karththarukku Idum Thaganapaligalaippola, Palipeedaththinmel Thaganikkakkadavan; Idhu Paavanivaaranapali.

13 ivvidhamaaga Mercholliya Kaariyangal Ondril Avan Seydha Paavaththukkaaga Aasaariyan Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan; Appozhudhu Adhu Avanukku Mannikkappadum, Meedhiyaanadhu Pojana Paliyaippola Aasaariyanai Serum Endraar.

15 oruvan Karththarukkuriya Parisuththamaanavaigalil Kutrancheydhu, Ariyaamaiyinaal Paavaththukkutpattaal, Avan Than Kutraththinimiththam Parisuththa Sthalaththu Sekkal Kanakkinpadiye, Nee Avanmel Sumaththum Abaraadham Evvalavo, Avvalavu Velli Sekkal Perum Pazhudhatra Oru Aattukkadaavaik Kutranivaaranapaliyaagak Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvandhu,

16 parisuththamaanadhaikkuriththuth Thaan Seydha Thappidhaththinaal Undaana Nashtaththai Seluththi, Adhinodu Aindhil Oru Pangai Adhigamaagak Kootti, Aasaariyanukkuk Koduppaanaaga; Kutranivaaranapaliyaagiya Aattukkadaavinaale Avanukkaaga Aasaariyan Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan; Appozhudhu Adhu Avanukku Mannikkappadum.

17 oruvan Seyyaththagaadhendru Karththarudaiya Kattalaigalinaal Vilakkappatta Yaadhondrai Seydhu Paavaththukkutpattaal, Adhai Avan Ariyaamaiyinaal Seydhaalum, Avan Kutramullavanaayirundhu, Than Akkiramaththai Sumappaan.

18 adhinimiththam Avan Kutranivaaranapaliyaaga, Un Madhippukku Sariyaana Pazhudhatra Oru Aattukkadaavai Aasaariyanidaththil Konduvaruvaanaaga; Avan Ariyaamal Seydha Thappidhaththai Aasaariyan Avanukkaaga Nivirththiseyyakkadavan; Appozhudhu Adhu Avanukku Mannikkappadum.
19 idhu Kutranivaaranapali; Avan Karththarukku Virodhamaaik Kutrancheydhaan Enbadhu Nichchayam Endraar.
